abstract: Two opposing blogs document the complaints of those who object to the concentration of wealth and those who object to people who don't pay income taxes.
snippet: Two opposing blogs document the complaints of those who object to the concentration of wealth and those who object to people who don't pay income taxes.
lead_paragraph: Welfare. Food stamps. Bankruptcy and minimum wage. Those are a few of the complaints of those in We Are the 99 Percent, a Tumblr blog recording the stories of those who sympathize with the Occupy Wall Street protests.
